product_name: Sherpani Access LE Tablet-Friendly Backpack - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Carry your necessities in style in this lightweight, low-profile backpack that fits snuggly for urban adventures, exploring ancient hill towns or even a short hike on a trail.
